Detailed Description

Data packaging manager, for saving game data.

This class creates a void buffer and can save any array or custom structure. It can then load this same data back in, including the size of the data.

Member Function Documentation

void * DataPackage::Create ( unsigned long  Size  ) 

Creates a new DataPackage of size Size.

Example usage, for a char* data package: DataPackage DP; char* output = (char *)DP.Create(dataSize); output = "Foo"; DP.Save("output.dat");

Returns:
A void* to the data buffer

void * DataPackage::Load ( char *  Filename,
unsigned long *  Size 
)

Loads a data package from the specified file name.

Load can load any data package save by DataPackage.

Parameters:
Filename The name of the file to load
Size A pass-by-reference variable that, when Load completes, holds the size of the data package.
Returns:
a void* to the data package (cast it to the correct type)
